text: The Bible says not to worry so I don't. I just get up in the morning and ask God for help to get through the day. If tomorrow shows up then I'll take the same shot tomorrow.
author: Paul Henderson

text: There we times when everybody in the house has the flu. You're cleaning up vomit and it's 2 in the morning, and you're wishing there was somebody else there to help you.
author: Meg Tilly

text: This morning someone sent me a very funny photo of me holding their puppy. We have matching colour jackets.
author: Luke Treadaway

text: I need to eat before a workout. If I exercise in the morning, I'll have a little oatmeal, cereal, or a hard-boiled egg with toast. If I go in the afternoon, I'll eat a turkey sandwich with cheese for lunch.
author: Ana Ortiz

text: Every morning I wake up with new ideas.
author: Caroll Shelby
